name: Cinemabition (20T2)
description:
Cinemabition is a playable exhibition featuring many of the projects created by Games students during Trimester 2 2020 at SAE's Brisbane Campus.

Cinemabition Team (20T2)

  • Jakob Houghton
  • Liam Sigrell
  • Reece Jones
  • Harrison Sinnamon
  • Jack Yeomans

Facilitators

  • Erika Verkaaik
  • Greg Quincey

Exhibition base + additional development

  • Iain McManus

Featured Projects

  • GAD180 - Apex Of The Monsters
  • GAD180 - CyberKnights of the Neon Table
  • GAD180 - HellScape
  • GAD180 - Kriegwassers
  • GAD180 - Space Rufflers
  • Studio 1 - Dis Structure
  • Studio 1 - JINDL (Janitor In Needlessly Dangerous Situations
  • Studio 1 - Neko Sushi Dorob
  • Studio 2 - Harmony
  • Studio 2 - I Hate Horror
  • Studio 2 - Indecisive
  • Studio 3 - Bloody Legless
  • Studio 3 - Demon Search
  • Studio 3 - Soul Bounds
  • CIU212 - Fizik
  • CIU212 - Just Sticks and Balls
  • CIU212 - Terra Aeger
  • CIU330 - E&CU
  • CIU330 - Mordtavlan
  • CIU330 - Sai'Mon'Sei
